roleset.name: work endlessly
roleset.note: TOIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'toil' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'toilsome' based on BOLT-6. (from toil.01-v)

example.name: toil-v: usually intransitive
example.text: ``Other people are making it overnight, and the rest who-1 [*T*-1] toil daily don't want to miss that opportunity when it seems to come along.''

example.name: toil-v: job as purpose
example.text: Some activists are toiling [*-1] to raise the profile of the two causes.
example.arg: [*-1] to raise the profile of the two causes

roleset.name: difficult, a lot of work
roleset.note: TOILSOME-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from toilsome.01-j)

example.name: toilsome-j
example.text: My mother - in - law and my father are still working . It will be too toilsome for my mother to look after the child by herself so it is definite that we will hire a babysitter to help out . This fee is not low .
example.arg: for my mother to look after the child by herself
